entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who was trying to tell Harry something for years. He is also described as having a still-sopping back of his jacket.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is cooler than Ron and is trying to find the tent again. He is also described as entering the tent with excitement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being fast asleep in the tent and not moving until Harry says her name several times.

entities.name: the doe
entities.description: The doe is mentioned as walking through the dark forest with Ron.

entities.name: the tent
entities.description: The tent is mentioned as being where Harry and Ron are trying to find. It is also described as being warm after the pool and the forest.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as they hugged each other when they were reunited. They also walked forward simultaneously.
Harry is excited to wake Hermione up, indicating that there may be a romantic relationship between them.
